targetAudience: Train your attention span to superhuman levels. Perfect for those with ADHD tendencies, constant distractions, or scattered focus.
scientificRationale: Attention is trainable. Research shows that meditation increases gray matter in attention-related brain regions, while social media decreases it. By combining daily meditation (attention training), social media limits (dopamine detox), deep reading (sustained focus practice), and studying (deliberate concentration) for 66 days, you rebuild attention span from scattered to laser-focused. This is neuroscience-backed focus training.
